pet_name.description: What is the name of the pet?

owner_name.description: What is the name of the pet's owner?

pet_breed.description: What is the breed of the pet?

vaccine_name.description: IMMUNIZATION DATES: what is the name of the vaccine administered?

date_administered.description: IMMUNIZATION DATES: When was the vaccine administered?

veterinarian.description: IMMUNIZATION DATES: Who is the veterinarian that administered the vaccine?

administration_records.description: All administration records for this vaccine, including dates and veterinarians.

vaccinations.description: What vaccinations were given to the pet, including the vaccine names, administration dates, and veterinarian names?

clinic_name.description: What is the name of the clinic where the vaccinations were administered? If the clinic name is 'Pet Shop Name', make say 'Paws and Reflect Vet Clinic'

clinic_address.description: What is the address of the clinic where the vaccinations were administered?

clinic_contact.description: What is the contact information of the clinic?
